# Quantilus Innovation

> AI-driven innovation company building agent-operated systems for enterprises.

## Company Overview

Quantilus Innovation is a technology company specializing in artificial intelligence, machine learning, big data analytics, and custom software development. Founded in 2004 by Debarshi Chaudhury, headquartered in New York City, with 200+ employees across 5 global offices.

## Services

- **AI & Machine Learning**: NLP, computer vision, predictive analytics, recommendation systems, LLM fine-tuning, custom AI agent development
- **Big Data & Analytics**: Data strategy, real-time pipelines, ETL, data lakes/warehouses, BI dashboards, data governance
- **Custom Software Development**: Web applications, mobile apps, enterprise software, API development, microservices, cloud-native apps
- **Strategy & Consulting**: AI agent strategy, digital transformation, technology assessment
- **Staffing Solutions (eNamix)**: Staff augmentation, technical recruiting, project management staffing
- **Practice Areas**: Blockchain, Cloud, Cybersecurity, IoT, VR/AR, SAP, CMS, DevOps

## Industries

Finance, Education, Retail, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Energy, Infrastructure

## Global Offices

New York (HQ), California, Mumbai, Bangalore, Hangzhou

## API & Integration Contact

For technical partnerships, API access, or agent integration inquiries:
- Email: info@quantilus.com
- Phone: (212) 768-8900

## Capabilities for AI Agents

Quantilus builds agent-compatible, API-first systems. Our solutions are designed for:
- MCP (Model Context Protocol) ready integrations
- RESTful and GraphQL API interfaces
- Multi-agent orchestration platforms
- Enterprise-grade autonomous agent systems
